mainText: We're recruiting for 38 posts around Scotland. If you're looking to start the year a little differently, take a look at the jobs we've posted on our website: www.turningpointscotland.com

At the recent Make It Happen committee meeting, 15 awards were approved including: Train fare for a woman from Edinburgh to visit family in Cardiff; Studio time for a man from Glasgow Supported Living to make recordings of his songs; A group application for day trips for the Something for the Weekend group in Edinburgh. To find out more about Make It Happen including who and how to apply, visit our website
Our latest annual report is available. Visit www.turningpointscotland.com to download a copy.
